item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown Including Plots R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: name = "andrea" print "my name is " + name ## my name is andrea summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min.
